title: cmd/go: Warn users getting dependencies from code.google.com
body:
Google Code is [shutting down](http://google-opensource.blogspot.com/2015/03/farewell-to-google-code.html), and when it does, users who import from `code.google.com` will no longer have those dependencies resolve.

There are a lot of things we could try to mitigate this breakage, and it won't happen for a while, but I think it may make sense to at least print a warning to users when running `go get`.
